mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT "bCommentId", "projectId", "boardId", "authorUserId", "crtDate", "mdfDate", "bComment", NULL AS "tCommentId", NULL AS "taskId", NULL AS "projectTaskId", NULL AS "projectAuthorUserId", NULL AS "projectCrtDate", NULL AS "projectMdfDate", NULL AS "tComment", 0 AS "calCommentId", 0 AS "calComProjectId", 0 AS "calComCalId", 0 AS "calComUserId", NULL AS "calComContent", NULL::TIMESTAMP AS "calComRegisterDate" FROM injoy."boardComment" WHERE "boardComment"."authorUserId" = 1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS "bCommentId", NULL AS "projectId", NULL AS "boardId", NULL AS "authorUserId", NULL AS "crtDate", NULL AS "mdfDate", NULL AS "bComment", "tCommentId", "taskId", "projectId", "authorUserId", "crtDate", "mdfDate", "tComment", NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM injoy."taskComment" WHERE "taskComment"."authorUserId" = 1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS "bCommentId", NULL AS "projectId", NULL AS "boardId", NULL AS "authorUserId", NULL AS "crtDate", NULL AS "mdfDate", NULL AS "bComment", NULL AS "tCommentId", NULL AS "taskId", NULL AS "projectId", NULL AS "authorUserId", NULL AS "crtDate", NULL AS"mdfDate", NULL AS "tComment", "calCommentId", "calComProjectId", "calComCalId", "calComUserId", "calComContent", "calComRegisterDate" FROM injoy."calComment" WHERE "calComment"."calComUserId" = 1 ) AS combined LEFT JOIN injoy."user" AS u ON u."id" = combined."authorUserId" OR u."id" = combined."projectAuthorUserId" OR u."id" = combined."calComUserId" LEFT JOIN injoy."project" AS p ON p."projectId" = combined."projectId" OR p."projectId" = combined."projectTaskId" OR p."projectId" = combined."calComProjectId" ORDER BY COALESCE(combined."crtDate", combined."projectCrtDate") DESC;
